title: Little Busters! Sekai no Saitou wa Ore ga Mamoru!

synonyms: Little Busters!: Sekai no Saitou ha Ore ga Mamoru!
alternative_titles.en: Little Busters!: I Will Protect the World of Saitou!
alternative_titles.ja: リトルバスターズ！世界の斎藤は俺が守る！

synopsis: A special unaired episode of Little Busters! sent to those who bought all 9 BD/DVD volumes of the anime. This episode includes the story about "Mask the Saitou."
